synopsis.text: For Akane Suzumiya, an ordinary student at Hakuryo High, her quiet life takes a dramatic turn with the arrival of the boisterous and self-assured baseball enthusiast, Jouji Gouda. On his first day at the new school, the impulsive Jouji proposes to Akane, leaving her in a state of shock and disbelief. Despite her initial annoyance towards his persistent and simple-minded nature, Jouji remains steadfast in his pursuit of Akane, determined to win her heart. As Akane navigates through this unexpected turn of events, she must decide whether to resist Jouji's advances or succumb to the whirlwind romance that has been thrust upon her.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
